channel.title: Comments on: 7 Leaves

item.title: By: merlehalladay
item.dc:creator: merlehalladay
item.description: This was the perfect flavor for someone who was a smoker and doesn't like flavored blends. Keep up the good work. Although, with this covid thing we are forced to order your product online. You need to try to lessen the cost of shipping some how.
item.content:encoded: This was the perfect flavor for someone who was a smoker and doesn’t like flavored blends. Keep up the good work. Although, with this covid thing we are forced to order your product online. You need to try to lessen the cost of shipping some how.

item.title: By: Sonja
item.dc:creator: Sonja
item.description: This definitely helped me stop smoking. The people at the shop are extremely helpful and patient! The mail order is the easiest to use. Quick delivery considering i live a way away.
item.content:encoded: This definitely helped me stop smoking. The people at the shop are extremely helpful and patient! The mail order is the easiest to use. Quick delivery considering i live a way away.
